description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter app called 'Notes'. It sets up the app's theme, routing, and state management with providers.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget that configures theme and navigation for the Notes app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; runs the NotesApp widget.

methods.name: _colorScheme
methods.description: Defines the color scheme for the app theme based on seed colors.

methods.name: _theme
methods.description: Constructs and returns the ThemeData for the app, customizing colors, app bar, FAB, cards, inputs, and dividers.
